name: Venom: Let There Be Carnage Movie Masterpiece Series PVC Action Figure 1/6 Venom 38 cm
description:
"Welcome back Eddie Brock, it's been a long time..."

Over a year after the events of Venom, investigative journalist Eddie Brock struggles to adjust to life as the host of an unearthly symbiote, which grants him super-human abilities in order to be a lethal vigilante. Eddie attempts to reignite his career by interviewing serial killer Cletus Kasady, who becomes the host of the symbiote Carnage and escapes prison after a failed execution.

Following the debut of Carnage Sixth Scale Collectible Figure from the Venom: Let There Be Carnage collection, Sideshow and Hot Toys are delighted to present the Venom Sixth Scale Collectible Figure.

The greatly detailed collectible figure is skillfully crafted based on Venom from the Venom: Let There Be Carnage movie, and features a Venomized Eddie Brock head sculpt, a grinning head sculpt, a head sculpt with fanged mouth and three interchangeable protruding tongues; a specialized body measuring approximately 38cm tall showcasing a high level of detailed sculpting specially on the skin texture; beautifully painted in black polarized paint that gives a natural shiny glow from different viewing angles; interchangeable symbiote weapons and accessories including sickle, a number of symbiote accessories with tentacles attachable to figure's back; a rod; specially crafted hands for poses; and a figure stand.

Bond with the alien symbiote figure to receive amazing powers and an unstable psyche!
